::: {.right-col}
I received my PhD in geophysics from UCLA and currently I am a Reginald A. Daly Postdoctoral Fellow at Harvard University.
I explore how Earth’s deep interior flows, deforms, and drives surface change—from mantle plumes to sea-level rise, with simulations, experiments and machine learning. Learn more on the [Research](research.qmd) page.


::: {.section-card}
